Sd J. GLASTE & J. PUGGESLEY appealed to Chancery & to the Court of Delegates which latter by Sentence reversed P.C.C.Sentence, declared sd Alexander to have died intestate & granted his Admon to sd Agnes

"Emanavit commissio Leonardo MILLER Avunculo Johis MILLER, Hugonis MILLER defunci dum vixit fillii nat. & itimi. De bene etc minori etate Johis MILLER Junioris fris natlls etc Itmi dei Hugonis duran De Bene etc Jurat in psona mri Francisi Clerk nori pucij procur et jurat" Hugh MILLER in margin
